title: SubWallet Web Dashboard
description: The web dashboard for SubWallet
subtitle: The web dashboard for SubWallet

title: Hydration
description: The Hydration Omnipool - an innovative Automated Market Maker (AMM) unlocks unparalleled efficiencies by combining all assets in a single trading pool.
subtitle: DeFi Protocol designed to bring liquidity to Polkadot

title: StellaSwap
description: StellaSwap is one of the first automated market-making (AMM), decentralized exchange (DEX) for the Moonbeam parachain network. Their main objective is to create a broader range of network effects to address the issues of liquidity in the DeFi space.
subtitle: Automated market-making, decentralized exchange on Moonbeam

title: Polkadot Staking Dashboard
description: The Polkadot Staking Dashboard is a tool only dedicated to staking on Polkadot, Kusama (Polkadot's canary network), and Westend (Polkadot's test network).
subtitle: The official dashboard for staking on Polkadot, Kusama, and Westend

title: dotinsights
description: A trusted research hub and data platform of Polkadot & Kusama Ecosystem made by SubWallet
subtitle: Interactive Polkadot & Kusama Ecosystem Map

title: Polkassembly
description: An open-source platform to vote and discuss governance proposals, motions, and referenda. You can sign up, link an address, and edit your proposals' description and title.
subtitle: Open-source Governance Platform

title: Moondrop
description: Drop tokens, match them, and compete in the ultimate blockchain puzzle game. Connect your wallet to start playing!
subtitle: The ultimate blockchain gaming experience on Moonbeam

title: Subsquare
description: SubSquare enables community members to propose, discuss and vote on governance proposals.
subtitle: Empower the Governance of Substrate

title: Bittensor TAO Staking dApp
description: Delegate Tao, the native Bittensor token, to any validator on the network. View and manage your existing delegations.
subtitle: Bittensor TAO Delegation and Staking

title: Turtle
description: Built by Velocity Labs, powered by Snowbridge, Turtle facilitates frictionless and cross-chain token transfers, with the smoothest UX in the Polkadot ecosystem.
subtitle: Cross-chain asset transfer dApp

title: Hyperbridge
description: Hyperbridge is a fully chain-agnostic interoperability protocol that enables developers to build applications that can securely interoperate with any blockchain. The Hyperbridge protocol presents developers with a unified interface for the multi-chain that allows for the secure and trust-free transfer of assets and data between different blockchains.
subtitle: A fully chain-agnostic interoperability protocol

title: Mythical Marketplace
description: Welcome to Mythical Marketplace! Here you can buy and sell NFL Rivals NFTs. Improve your team’s stats and get amazing digital collectibles.
subtitle: Buy and Sell NFTs on Mythical Market

title: Avail Bridge
description: The Avail team partnered with Succinct Labs to develop a trust-minimized bridge between Avail DA and Ethereum. The Avail bridge currently supports bridging AVAIL tokens between Avail DA and Ethereum.
subtitle: Bridge AVAIL token between Avail and Ethereum

title: Omni Liquid Staking
description: Omni Liquid Staking is the first omni-chain liquid staking protocol developed based on Bifrost SLPx, cross-chain interoperability and consensus security provided by Polkadot XCM, realizing the vision of minting, using, and aggregating the liquidity across chains.
subtitle: Omni-chain liquid staking protocol

title: Moonbeam dApp
description: Moonbeam delivers complete Ethereum compatibility within a Polkadot parachain environment. It is also compatible with the Substrate and Polkadot ecosystem, including block explorers, wallets, parachains, and more, allowing users the flexibility to choose the right tools and services for the job.
subtitle: The ultimate platform for Moonbeam Network

title: Bifrost App
description: Bifrost is a modular, scalable, non-custodial omni-chain LSD parachain based on Polkadot. It provides standardized, high-yield, safe, and reliable underlying interest-bearing assets for Web3 through XCM, and is realizing the omni-chain vision of using any LSD on any chain.
subtitle: Cross-chain Liquid Staking

title: Unique Marketplace
description: The Unique marketplace supports next-generation NFT Utility tools for creators. Enjoy a truly seamless experience by creating and trading the most advanced NFTs on the Unique and Quartz Networks.
subtitle: NFT Marketplace

title: Polimec
description: Polimec enables fundraising in a decentralized, transparent, and regulatory compliant manner, aligning stakeholder incentives during and beyond the fundraise.
subtitle: Decentralized Fundraising platform

title: Tanssi - Let's Forkin Dance
description: 'Let's Forkin Dance'—the Tanssi Incentivized TestNet Campaign is a mix of on-chain and off-chain quests designed for the Tanssi community. Whether you're a developer, a casual user, or a key network supporter, there's something for you.
subtitle: Tanssi Incentivized TestNet Campaign

title: Astar Portal
description: Astar Portal is the hub of a multi-chain, one-stop platform for managing assets and dApp Staking - build2earn protocol.
subtitle: Astar & Shiden Network

title: Phala App
description: Phala Network is revolutionizing Web3 by providing dApp developers with an off-chain compute infrastructure that is truly decentralized and trustless. By connecting Smart Contracts to our off-chain programs called Phat Contracts, developers can supercharge their dApps with seamless cross-chain integrations, connectivity to the internet, and heavy computation.
subtitle: Privacy-preserving cloud computing service

title: Avail Space
description: The unified dApp for Avail ecosystem
subtitle: Everything Avail. In one space.

title: SubConnect
description: SubConnect is a single Web3 provider solution for all Polkadot-based wallets, EVM wallets, and Cold Wallets. This is a simple Demo DApp to test it out.
subtitle: The Demo DApp for Substrate Wallet Connect

title: Polkasafe
description: PolkaSafe is a cross-chain, non-custodial, enterprise-grade multisig platform specifically designed to catalyze the efficiency, security, and ease of digital transactions across the blockchain ecosystem.
subtitle: Multisig Wallet & SDK, empowering businesses and dApps

title: Polkadot.js
description: Polkadot-JS is a collection of tools, utilities, and libraries that interface with the Polkadot blockchain in a granular way.
subtitle: Tool collection for interacting with the Polkadot Network

title: Avail Staking Dashboard
description: Avail Staking Dashboard is the easiest way to stake AVAIL, check validator stats, manage your nominations and join nomination pools.
subtitle: Staking Dashboard on Avail

title: Aleph Zero Dashboard
description: Aleph Zero Dashboard is the easiest way to stake AZERO, check validator stats, manage your nominations and join nomination pools.
subtitle: Staking Dashboard on Aleph Zero

title: Manta Pacific Bridge
description: Bridge funds from Ethereum to Manta Pacific to start exploring Manta Pacific - the first EVM-native modular execution layer for wide ZK applications adoption, with Manta’s universal circuit and zk interface.
subtitle: The Bridge to Manta Pacific

title: Vara Staking Dashboard
description: Vara Staking Dashboard is the easiest way to stake Vara, check validator stats, manage your nominations, and join nomination pools.
subtitle: Staking Dashboard on Vara Network

title: Manta dApp
description: Manta Atlantic is the ZK L1 chain on Polkadot. With Manta dApp, you can bridge to Manta Atlantic, or stake MANTA on Manta Atlantic to secure the network and earn rewards!
subtitle: Bridge and Stake MANTA on Manta Atlantic

title: Zeitgeist
description: Zeitgeist is a new innovative platform for predicting future events.
subtitle: Prediction Markets Protocol

title: Acala Platform
description: Acala is a specialized stablecoin and liquidity blockchain that is decentralized, cross-chain by design, and future-proof with forkless upgradability.
subtitle: The Acala's DeFi platform

title: Creditcoin Staking Dashboard
description: Stake on Creditcoin to secure the network powering real-world assets and earn rewards.
subtitle: Staking platform for CTC (Creditcoin)

title: NFT.io
description: NFT.io is the latest innovation from the Enjin team, a global NFT Marketplace fully integrated with the Enjin Blockchain.
subtitle: Enjin NFT Marketplace

title: Ternoa Hub
description: Gain great rewards and participate in unique opportunities just by holding CAPS.
subtitle: Stake CAPS, earn rewards and get airdrops

title: Unleash
description: Unleash is dedicated to revolutionizing the way Intellectual Property (IP) is managed, addressing longstanding challenges through innovative solutions. Our aim is to create a more efficient, transparent, and secure system that protects creators and fosters economic growth.
subtitle: IP Operating System on Story

title: Stargate
description:
Stargate is a fully composable liquidity transport protocol that lives at the heart of Omnichain DeFi.
With Stargate, users & dApps can transfer native assets cross-chain while accessing the protocol’s unified liquidity pools with instant guaranteed finality. The universe is infinite with Stargate.
subtitle: Liquidity transport protocol

title: PiperX
description: PiperX is the next-generation IPFi platform, aiming to serve as the ultimate liquidity layer for $61T IP assets on Story.
subtitle: DEX and Liquidity Layer

title: Verio
description: Unlock IP liquidity with Verio vIP through Asset Staking and Liquid Staking
subtitle: IP Trust Engine on Story

title: Story Hunt
description: The Story Native DEX, unlocking $61T IP market liquidity and yields, powering IPFi.
subtitle: IPFi DEX on Story

title: Moonwell App
description: Moonwell is an open and decentralized lending and borrowing protocol built on Base, Moonbeam, and Moonriver. The app's intuitive design ensures a seamless user experience, enabling users to easily do more with their digital assets.
subtitle: Lending and borrowing protocol

title: Euphrates dApp
description: Euphrates allows stakers and liquidity providers of LSTs (liquid staking tokens) to earn boosted rewards in ACA as well as participating project tokens with minimum effort.
subtitle: Boosted Liquid Staking

title: Incognitee - Privacy Sidechains
description: Welcome to Incognitee - an exclusive and discreet hub in the heart of Web3. We enable private transfers and unlinkable voting, so you can play away from the crowd's eyes. Your transactions? Secret handshakes between you and your chosen peers.
subtitle: Exclusive and discreet hub

title: Chainviz
description:
Chainviz is a real-time 3D visualization of the Polkadot machine.
Chainviz is a Helikon Labs project, envisioned and developed by Kutsal Kaan Bilgin and designed by Klad.
subtitle: Real-time 3D visualization of the Polkadot machine.

title: PolkaIdentity
description: PolkaIdentity revolutionizes digital identity with self-sovereign, fraud-proof credentials anchored to Polkadot’s blockchain. Own your data, share selectively, and unlock seamless access to DeFi, DAOs, and Web3.
subtitle: Decentralized IDs Registration on Polkadot

title: AirLyft
description: Discover Thriving Communities, Participate in Engaging Campaigns and Win Irresistible Rewards like NFTS, Tokens and Whitelists.
subtitle: Multichain & Decentralized Quest Platform

title: The Kus dApp
description: Stake your DOT and KSM with The Kusamarian, or delegate DOT votes!
subtitle: The Kusamarian Staking and Delegating App

title: Singular
description: Discover the future of NFTs on Singular - the NFT 2.0 marketplace. Mint, trade, & experience advanced NFTs with unique capabilities.
subtitle: the NFT 2.0 Marketplace - the future of NFTs starts here

title: Common
description: Common is a multichain set of tools that bring innovation to on-chain trading. Make your trades fast and efficient.
subtitle: Aleph Zero's unique DeFi solution

title: Deq
description: Deq is a native liquid staking platform for Avail tokens on Ethereum. Get rewarded for staking AVAIL with Deq!
subtitle: Native liquid staking for Avail

title: Kanaria Skybreach
description: Skybreach is a metaverse project by the RMRK team, demonstrating and fully utilising the 5 elementary NFT 2.0 legos to create a truly decentralized and permissionless metaverse.
subtitle: Decentralized metaverse

title: Mintaur App
description: Launch your RMRK Modular NFTs fast with Mintaur. RMRK Modular NFTs are ERC standards that allow NFTs to be multi-asset, nested, soulbound, composable, and emotable.
subtitle: Mint modern modular NFTs on demand

title: Polkaswap
description: Polkaswap is a non-custodial, cross-chain AMM DEX protocol for swapping tokens based on Polkadot and Kusama relay chains, Polkadot and Kusama parachains, and blockchains directly connected via bridges.
subtitle: AMM DEX protocol for swapping tokens based on Polkadot and Kusama

title: Mandala Clan App
description: Mandala is the world's first Enlightenment Simulator: a cross-media, cross-media Metaverse combining Avatar NFTs with a geolocation-based AR mobile game + AAA Unreal Engine MMORPG, TV series, and graphic novels (Dark Horse Comics).
subtitle: Cross-media, cross-media Metaverse combining Avatar NFTs

title: Beamswap
description: Beamswap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) with an automated market maker (AMM), providing liquidity and peer-to-peer transactions. The DeFi hub provides an array of services and features supporting the DeFi and Web3 spaces, including crypto swaps, staking, and yield farming, and serves as a launch platform for new and exciting projects built on the Moonbeam Network.
subtitle: DeFi hub on Moonbeam Network

title: Polkawatch
description: Polkawatch is an analytic tool designed to measure effective decentralization of Polkadot’s Validation process.
subtitle: Decentralization analytics for Polkadot

title: Moonsama
description: Moonsama, the first NFT marketplace on Moonriver

title: doTreasury
description: dotreasury.com aim to introduce remarks from councilors and communities to improve current kusama treasury with a retrospect mechanism.
subtitle: doTreasury | Empower treasury with credit building

title: Emotes App
description: RMRK’s NFT smart contract allows anyone to react to any NFT. Reactions are expressed in Unicode standardized emojis.
subtitle: React to any NFTs using the RMRK NFT Emotes Standard

title: Mimir dApp
description: Mimir supports advanced multisig account composition and nesting. Mimir supports flexible member and threshold management, and direct interaction with third-party applications.
subtitle: Multisig Account Management Tool for Polkadot and Substrate

title: Tanssi dApp
description: Tanssi's Appchain Infrastructure Protocol simplifies appchain deployment. Explore the Dancebox Testnet and Tanssi mainnet.
subtitle: Launch your decentralized appchain

title: Centrifuge App
description: The Centrifuge Protocol includes all the features needed to finance real world assets on a blockchain, from tokenization, securitization, up to liquidity integrations, all built on each other and transparently governed by token holders.
subtitle: The platform for on-chain credit

title: Karura Platform
description: Founded by the Acala Foundation, Karura is a scalable, EVM-compatible network optimized for DeFi. The platform offers a suite of financial applications including: a trustless liquid staking token protocol (liquid KSM), an AMM DEX and an app platform that is EVM-compatible and highly customizable (based on Substrate) – all with micro gas fees that can be paid in any token.
subtitle: Karura’s all-in-one DeFi platform

title: Moonriver dApp
description: Moonriver is a companion network to Moonbeam and provides a permanently incentivized canary network.
subtitle: The platform for Moonriver Network

title: Heima Dashboard
description:
Heima Network is a cutting-edge Layer 1 blockchain designed to enable seamless multi-chain and cross-chain interoperability. Evolved from the Litentry Network, Heima integrates all the advanced components of its predecessor, including:
- Identity Management Module: A robust framework for managing decentralized identities.
= Security and Privacy Module: Powered by Trusted Execution Environments (TEE) to safeguard sensitive data and transactions.
subtitle: The platform for Heima Network

title: Upgradooor App
description: Amplify your regular ERC-721 NFTs by converting them into supercharged RMRK NFTs. Upgrading your ERC-721 NFT allows you to unlock the capabilities of Modular NFTs. You'll gain immediate access to nesting capabilities, enabling you to either send your NFT into others or receive NFTs.
subtitle: Supercharge your ERC721 NFTs with powers of RMRK's Modular NFTs

title: Täniko
description: Create assets, edit metadata, update admin accounts and revoke root privileges. It also allows you to pay tx fees in any asset that has a pool!
subtitle: Create and manage assets on Asset Hub

title: Birdeye
description: Birdeye's core objective is to assist traders in their investment deliberations through the provisioning of data-centric market analysis tools sourced from Birdeye and its affiliated partners.
subtitle: Blockchain Data Aggregator tailored for Traders

title: Flappy Wud
description:
Tap to jump and dodge the wood! The more $WUD in your connected wallet, the higher your multiplier.
There are some powerful items floating around so try not to miss them!
subtitle: Gavun Wud's first game

title: Battleship
description: Battleship is a strategic board game in which two players compete to sink an opponent's fleet hidden from their view.
subtitle: Vara Battleship Game

title: Vara-man
description: Welcome, treasure hunter! In this game, you can test your strength in the quest for treasures. The game offers various difficulty levels and game modes. Connect your wallet.
subtitle: A blockchain implementation of the game Pac-Man

title: Racing Cars
description: A racing car game in which you compete not against a human, but against a smart contract. You will be given the choice to either accelerate or shoot at the nearest car to slow it down.
subtitle: Vara Car Racing game

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A classic game of tic-tac-toe in which you compete not against a human, but against a smart contract.
subtitle: Vara Tic-Tac-Toe game

title: Liberland App
description: Liberland is a sovereign nation state located on the Danube with governance, business and legal system running on-chain.
subtitle: The freest country on Earth

title: 1inch
description:
1inch aims to be One-stop access
to decentralized finance. 1inch analyzes thousands of quotes and fees across multiple DEXes to provide users with the best rates.
subtitle: DeFi / DEX aggregator on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Optimism, Polygon, Arbitrum

title: Portal Bridge Wormhole
description: The Portal is an application built on top of Wormhole. When you bridge tokens through Portal, the origin token gets locked in a smart contract, and a new Portal wrapped token gets minted on the target chain.
subtitle: Token Bridge built on top of Wormhole

title: Aave
description: Aave is a decentralised non-custodial liquidity market protocol where users can participate as suppliers or borrowers. Suppliers provide liquidity to the market to earn a passive income, while borrowers are able to borrow in an overcollateralised (perpetually) or undercollateralised (one-block liquidity) fashion.
subtitle: Open Source Liquidity Protocol

title: Uniswap
description: Uniswap is a protocol that facilitates peer-to-peer market making and swapping of ERC-20 tokens on the Ethereum blockchain. The Uniswap dApp allows for easy interaction with the Uniswap protocol.
subtitle: Peer-to-peer system designed for exchanging cryptocurrencies on Ethereum

title: Chainlist
description: Chainlist is a list of EVM networks. Users can use the information to connect their wallets and Web3 middleware providers to the appropriate Chain ID and Network ID to connect to the correct chain.
subtitle: RPCs list for EVM networks

title: Curve
description: Curve is an exchange liquidity pool on Ethereum (like Uniswap) designed for (1) extremely efficient stablecoin trading (2) low risk, supplemental fee income for liquidity providers, without an opportunity cost.
subtitle: Creating deep on-chain liquidity using advanced bonding curves

title: OpenSea
description: The world’s first and largest digital marketplace for crypto collectibles and non-fungible tokens (NFTs). Buy, sell, and discover exclusive digital items.
subtitle: Marketplace for crypto collectibles and NFTs

title: Robonomics
description: Robonomics platform provides tools for working with the robot economy network. Robonomics allow designers of smart cities and industry 4.0 zones to build trust among the autonomous robots services, provide direct user access via dapp for ordering products from autonomous factories and services of urban sensor networks. This in turn will allow us to put in place a decentralized system that globally monitors the activities of cyber physical systems.
subtitle: Robonomics

title: cBridge
description: Celer cBridge is a decentralized and non-custodial asset bridge that supports 170+ tokens across 40+ blockchains and layer-2 rollups. Built on top of the Celer Inter-chain Message Framework, cBridge has processed ~$14B cross-chain asset transfer volume on 40+ blockchains for more than 530K unique users, and is quickly growing and expanding into more blockchains and layer-2s.
subtitle: Multi-blockchain asset bridge, instant transfer, zero trust

title: Cointelegraph Decentralization Guardians
description: Support decentralization and earn staking rewards by nominating your DOT to Cointelegraph's validator to secure the network and contribute to a more open and resilient blockchain ecosystem.
subtitle: Decentralization Guardians by Cointelegraph

title: TaoFi
description: TaoFi is a suite of foundational DeFi products on Bittensor, the home of decentralized AI. These products will serve agents and human users alike, with a focus on unlocking new, crypto-enabled AI use cases, while increasing liquidity across Bittensor.
subtitle: DeFi products on Bittensor

title: Polkadot Bounties
description: Manage bounties with PAPI’s bounties app
subtitle: Manage bounties with PAPI’s bounties app

title: Chaotic (beta)
description: Create, Collect, Sell NFTs
subtitle: Polkadot NFT Marketplace

title: Unique Staking Hub
description: Unique Staking Hub enables users to stake their ecosystem tokens to support the development of the Unique Network blockchain.
subtitle: Stake your UNQ and QTZ tokens to earn APY

title: Dotmemo
description: Capture your unforgettable moments as digital badges on the Polkadot network.
subtitle: Create and Claim NFTs on Polkadot

title: Get Real
description: Seize your chance for rewards from PEAQ’s reward pool by connecting, contributing, and climbing the leaderboard.
subtitle: Join peaq’s Get Real campaign

title: Aradia
description: The ultimate launchpad for Astar Network. Mint NFTs and tokens, discover collections, and earn rewards in the Astar ecosystem.
subtitle: NFT Launchpad on Astar Network

title: Gen6 (Beta)
description: G6 Networks offers secure, scalable solutions, empowering businesses and individuals to thrive in a decentralized world.
subtitle: Blockchain for Real-World Integration

title: DotYappers
description:
Join the Polkadot ecosystem and
make valuable contributions on X
subtitle: Start yapping about Polkadot

title: UQUID
description:
UQUID is an E-commerce platform with a Shop-to-Earn experience.
Verified merchants, exclusive deals, cashback and Payin3 with Crypto on 167M+ physical products, 468k+ digital products & NFTs.
subtitle: Web3 Shopping Infrastructure

title: ChessOnChain
description: ChessOnchain is a play-to-earn digital chess game where players can collect NFTs and compete in multichain/interchain chess competitions and 1v1 matches.
subtitle: Multi-chain chess game

title: Snowbridge
description: Snowbridge is a general-purpose, trustless, and decentralized bridge between Polkadot and Ethereum. It is part of the Polkadot SDK and exists as a common-good bridge on BridgeHub.
subtitle: General-purpose, trustless, and decentralized bridge between Polkadot and Ethereum
